author: felixk
msg: Due to the work of Carlos (maven - osgi, http://www.jroller.com/carlossg/entry/eclipse_jars_now_in_maven):
- Adapt the local-repository to the same 'osgi' structure as it exists now @ http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/eclipse/ (sadly artifacts for 3.3.1.1 are not in yet)
- Adapt groupId/artifactId of the directory-studio modules according 'osgi' structure from above, so they're named the same way.
- Adapt studio-plugin goals to the new structure and naming (make use of maven-osgi library http://svn.apache.org/viewvc/maven/shared/trunk/maven-osgi/)

author: jukka
msg: JCR-995: Updated the jcr-nodemanagement POM in preparation for release

author: mrisaliti
msg: Product Review forms (ftl/widgets screen) has now the same look and feel (Part of issue OFBIZ-1544).
I have also applied a modified patch from Scott Gray "Review approval system needs to work on a larger scale" (OFBIZ-20).
